website_summaries.verdict: This slide's exciting design and ample activities will have kiddos splashing in the water for hours. Parents appreciate the mid-level price.
pros: Offers ample activities for youngsters, including wading, climbing, and sliding
Hippo design is appealing to kids
Mesh barrier keeps them from tumbling off the top of the slide
Holds about 3 kids at a time
cons: Weight limit of 150 pounds is a bit less than some competing slides
Rare reports of slides that were damaged upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: So good
customer_reviews.text: This slide can be played with water or without water. The things in the slide makes the kids want to explore and have fun. This slide is waterproof, tear resistant, wear resistant, and the colors do not fade. Kids would enjoy playing in the water, going down the slide, getting splashed with water, and climbing up the walls.
customer_reviews.author: vicky

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Its been a life saver for the summer ahead during the lock down. It's been only few weeks since we had it but so far so good. I can see that the water hose that came with it may need replacement every year. Other than that it's wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: janedoe123

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Great price and it comes with the blower!! Perfect for these quarantine days! Our kids love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: james

customer_reviews.title: Great fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is for our 8 year old granddaughter and she loves it. Pricey but with the current COVID situation she needs something fun to do and this works! The Hippo Waters blowup is sturdier than I expected and appears to be durable. Very easy to set up in just a few minutes. If you’re concerned wit cost vs quality I am pleased with this purchase and recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Best summer purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made water slide! We had 6 kids going up and down it! Ages ranged from 1-9. I would definitely buy!
customer_reviews.author: Verna-Mariah

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to assemble, sturdy, and my 5 and 2 year old grandsons love it!
customer_reviews.author: Leigh A. Mygrant

customer_reviews.title: My 4 year old loves it (and I do, too)!
customer_reviews.text: First, customer service on this product has been absolutely stellar. Second, be sure to connect the sprayer with the orange velcro backing to the cannon and the sprayer with the blue backing to the top of the slide. Third, the slide is providing hours and hours of fun and connection among our family. Totally worth it (including the associated water bills).
customer_reviews.author: wootywootwoot

customer_reviews.title: Fair
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my kids busy for sure! I could tell the seams may have been stretched as I noticed water leaking from the pool but it doesn’t affect the use of the pool/waterslide. Easy to set up and put away. Update: 3 to 4 stars :) wonderful customer service. I requested a replacement of the tubing and they were amazing at updating me step by step in the process. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Eye Vee Es

customer_reviews.title: The kids had a blast on this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson for his birthday party. He had so much fun. I never saw the kids laugh so hard. It is very durable easy to set up. He has been using it all summer. I did price around Saw it for much more on other websites all in all it’s a great buy! I am sure we will get a few more years of fun out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Joannez

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids ages 2-8....any older and it’s not as durable
customer_reviews.text: I have only had for a week. Love the product but very expensive considering it’s not that big...I’ll review again after using for the summer. Hopefully it was worth it
customer_reviews.author: Janelle broncheau

customer_reviews.title: Great slide!
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of kids and grandchildren over and they are very rough. Held up very well so far. Inflates quickly and easy to take down. Used it heavily for 3 days and it did well. It is smaller than expected but even the 10 years old liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A lot fun and easy to move.
customer_reviews.text: I had a bigger one before. This one is good size. I can open and close by myself. And easy to move. Kids have a lot fun with it. If it is little bit cheaper will be better.
customer_reviews.author: MARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely love this! It is very easy and quick to setup and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous
customer_reviews.text: The slide is dangerous as the children go down the slide too fast and go off the water slide. Needs a higher wall by the end of the slide.
customer_reviews.author: JIG789

customer_reviews.title: Kids loved!
customer_reviews.text: Used it last weekend. Bought our own pump but would’ve been easier to just get the pump with the bounce house as optioned. Kids loved it and it was pretty easy to set up between me and the hubby. The water caused some arguments, but that’s what kids do sometimes. I loved watching them love this.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Fun in the sun.
customer_reviews.text: I just hate that it is so hard to clean. My seven year old enjoyed it. He went from the pool to this.
customer_reviews.author: frances

customer_reviews.title: Is this safe?
customer_reviews.text: I don't have this but these pictures are totally photo shopped. For example why does the little girl have pink sneakers on?
customer_reviews.author: alejandra

product_meta.title: BOUNTECH Inflatable Water Slide, Hippo Themed Bounce House, Bouncer Park w/ Splashing Slide, Climbing Wall, Water Cannon, Including Carry Bag, Stakes, Repair Kit, Hose (with 740W Air Blower)
feature_bullets: ☀️ Multiple Playing Areas: This hippo themed water bouncer features one smooth curved water slide, one climbing wall and a large splash pool with water cannon. Meanwhile, the sprayers on the top of slide will come out of steady spray of water to keep the slides wet.

💕 Durable Materials & Safety Design: Made of heavy-duty puncture-resistant 300D oxford, this inflatable waterslide can be used for long time. Moreover, the climb areas are made of extraordinary 600D oxford. 💕 Besides, the top of slide is surrounded by net to protect your kids. ASTM Certified.

🌊 Enjoy Water Fun: An exciting climbing wall and slippery slide for whooshing into the refreshing splash down pool. This inflatable slide bouncer is ideal for children in the age of 3-10, and could turn your backyard into children’s amusement park. Recommend 2-3 kids at a time.

🏖️ Quick Inflation & Deflation: Inflated size: 9.5ft (L) X 12.5ft (D) X 7.5ft (H). This waterslide takes only a few minutes to inflate and it also can be quickly deflated through a long air outlet tube. The whole process does not have to wait for a long time. (Recommended for use with 740W blower, included.)

😊 Considerable & Practical Accessory: The Hippo water bouncer comes with 4 ground stakes for securing the stability and firmness of the entire water park. A pack of repairing accessories used for easy maintenance and a carrying bag provided for easy storage and transportation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars45 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
